article_title: Novartis Buys Another 2.5% In Israel's Gamida Cell
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: novartis, buys, another, 25, israels, gamida, cell

og.description: Novartis invested an additional $15 million into Gamida Cell's clinical programs aiming to develop new treatments for hematological malignancies and blood cancers on Sunday.
